title: User Registration with Email Verification
description: Verify that a new user can register with valid credentials and complete email verification successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user details including email and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that confirmation email is sent to the registered email.
Simulate clicking the verification link from the email.
Verify user account is activated and user is redirected to onboarding or login.

title: Login with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure users can log in successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid registered email and password.
Submit login form.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Confirm that login fails when invalid email or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid email or password.
Submit login form.
Verify error message is displayed and access is denied.

title: 3D Avatar Attribute Customization
description: Validate users can customize head-to-toe avatar attributes (height, build, skin tone, hair color) and changes update in real time.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the 3D avatar customization playground.
Modify height, build, skin tone, and hair color attributes via UI controls.
Verify the 3D avatar model updates instantly to reflect each attribute change accurately.
Save the customized avatar.
Verify the avatar attributes are persisted in the user profile database and reload correctly on revisit.

title: 3D Avatar Interaction Controls
description: Ensure users can drag, rotate, and zoom the 3D avatar models smoothly without glitches.

steps.description: Open 3D avatar playground page.
Perform drag action to reposition avatar in scene.
Verify avatar moves smoothly corresponding to drag input.
Use mouse wheel or touch gesture to zoom in and out.
Verify zoom operations adjust avatar size fluidly and stay within valid bounds.
Rotate the avatar using rotation controls.
Avatar rotates smoothly with no visual artifacts.

title: Virtual Clothing Selection and Color Customization
description: Validate the workflow for selecting clothing items (shirts, pants, shoes) and customizing their color variants.

steps.description: Navigate to the product catalog and filter to clothing category.
Select a product and open customization options.
Choose different color variants for the selected clothing item.
Verify the 3D outfit preview updates in real time to reflect color changes.
Add multiple clothing items to the avatar outfit.
Ensure all selected items are correctly displayed together on the 3D avatar.

title: Product Catalog Filters and Pagination
description: Confirm the product catalog filters (category, color, size) work correctly and product listings update accordingly, including pagination handling.

steps.description: Navigate to product catalog page.
Apply filters such as category=shirts, color=blue, size=medium.
Verify only products matching all filters are displayed.
Navigate through pages using pagination controls.
Verify products display correctly on each page and filter settings persist.

title: Shopping Cart Persistence Across Sessions
description: Test that the shopping cart preserves added items and quantities when user logs out and logs back in.

steps.description: Log in and add several products with different quantities to the shopping cart.
Verify cart contents and quantities appear correctly in the cart UI.
Log out and log back in with the same user account.
Verify previously added cart items and quantities are restored correctly.
Remove an item from the cart and update quantities.
Verify cart updates persist after page reload.

title: Checkout Flow Completeness and Validation
description: Verify that checkout form validates input fields properly and the order completes with confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the checkout page with a valid cart.
Enter valid shipping and payment details and submit the form.
Verify order confirmation page is displayed.
Repeat checkout with invalid or incomplete form fields.
Verify appropriate validation error messages are shown and submission is prevented.

title: Save and Retrieve Outfit Combinations
description: Test that users can save customized outfit combinations and later retrieve them linked to their profiles and avatars.

steps.description: Create a customized outfit combination using the outfit picker.
Save the outfit and reload the user profile page.
Verify the saved outfit appears in the saved outfits list.
Select the saved outfit to preview.
Verify outfit preview correctly loads all associated clothing items and avatar details.

title: Access Control for Protected Routes
description: Ensure authenticated-only routes block unauthorized users and redirect them appropriately.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected dashboard, profile, and checkout pages as a guest (not logged in).
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login.
Log in as a valid user and reaccess the same protected routes.
Verify user can access protected pages without restriction.

title: Row Level Security Enforcement
description: Verify database Row Level Security policies effectively restrict user access to only their own data.

steps.description: Log in as User A and request profile, outfits, and order data.
Verify only User A’s data is accessible.
Attempt to access User B’s data by manipulating API endpoints or database queries.
Verify access is denied per RLS policy.

title: Responsive Design across Devices
description: Check that all key pages (landing, dashboard, catalog, profile, 3D playground) render and function correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open application pages on desktop browser and verify layout and functionality.
Repeat on tablet viewport size and ensure UI elements adapt properly.
Test on mobile viewport including touch gestures and navigation menu.
Verify no broken layouts, truncated text, or unusable controls across all devices.

title: Real-time Updates in Dashboard Analytics
description: Validate that analytics charts and data refresh in real time without latency or application errors.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to dashboard analytics page.
Verify initial display of analytics summaries and graphs.
Trigger data changes (e.g., add new outfits or orders) and observe dashboard updates.
Verify updated data is reflected in charts and analytics components without page reload.

title: UI Animations and Performance
description: Ensure all animations powered by Framer Motion and GSAP execute smoothly without observable performance degradation on typical user actions.

steps.description: Navigate through main UI components with animations such as menu transitions, product gallery effects, and onboarding steps.
Verify animations appear smooth, no janks or delays occur, and no crashes or UI freezes.

title: Onboarding Flow Completion and Data Integrity
description: Verify new users complete the onboarding steps and their profile data is saved correctly with flags indicating onboarding completion.

steps.description: Register a new user and follow onboarding flow steps.
Complete all onboarding steps and submit final data.
Verify user profile updates with onboarding completion flags in database.
Log out and log back in as the same user.
Verify onboarding flow is not prompted again.

title: Outfit Sharing and Access Permissions
description: Test that saved outfit combinations can be shared via appropriate links or access controls and only authorized users can view shared outfits.

steps.description: Save an outfit combination and generate a shareable link.
Access the link in an authenticated session not belonging to the owner.
Verify sharing permissions are respected; access granted or denied based on settings.
Access the link as the owner user.
Verify full access and editing capabilities are available.

title: Error Handling for Failed Network Requests
description: Validate that the application gracefully handles and displays error messages for failed API calls including product catalog, checkout, and avatar save operations.

steps.description: Simulate network failures or server errors for API endpoints.
Perform actions such as loading product lists, submitting checkout, and saving avatars.
Verify user-friendly error messages are shown and app state remains stable.

title: Database Schema and Migration Verification
description: Ensure SQL scripts for table creation, RLS policies, and indexes apply correctly and the database starts in a consistent state.

steps.description: Run all provided SQL migration and setup scripts sequentially on a blank database.
Verify all tables, indexes, and RLS policies are created as expected with no errors.
Insert sample data and validate constraints and permissions.
Confirm data integrity and RLS enforcement.

title: Secure Supabase Authentication Integration
description: Verify Supabase authentication integration including safe helpers, server-side rendering support, and proper token management.

steps.description: Perform sign-in and sign-out flows with Supabase auth client.
Verify tokens are securely stored and cleared on logout.
Access protected API routes with and without valid tokens.
Confirm access is granted only with valid authentication and denied otherwise.
